mapper.select: select t.* from cms_problem t where t.id=#{id}

select t.*,t2.counter finish_counter from ( select to_char(to_date(t.createdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'iw')weeks,count(*)counter from cms_problem t where 1=1
and t.createuser in (select usercode from sys_user where orgid in(select id from ggs.sys_org t start with t.id=#{orgid} connect by prior t.id=t.pid) )
group by to_char(to_date(t.createdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'iw'))t left join ( select to_char(to_date(t.createdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'iw')weeks,count(*)counter from cms_problem t where t.isfinish='1'
and t.createuser in (select usercode from sys_user where orgid in(select id from ggs.sys_org t start with t.id=#{orgid} connect by prior t.id=t.pid) )
group by to_char(to_date(t.createdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'iw') )t2 on t.weeks=t2.weeks where rownum < 10
order by t.weeks
